title: Elon Musk compares Apple’s App Store tax to having a 30% fee for using the internet, ‘definitely not ok’
content:
The man of the hour, Elon Musk, is tweeting as much as he can in these past few weeks – and might be related to his deal to buy Twitter. In his latest tweet, Musk is once again attacking Apple’s App Store fees to developers. This time, he compares it to having a “30% tax on the internet.”

more…

The post Elon Musk compares Apple’s App Store tax to having a 30% fee for using the internet, ‘definitely not ok’ appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Elon Musk is once again attacking Apple's App Store fees to developers. This time, he compares it to having a "30% tax on the internet."
